DOC.brief_summary: In study propose test Biofusionary Bebe order reduce skin laxity improve contour cosmesis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Magnetic Induction Treat Wrinkles
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion study : Male female 21 65 year old , Clinically appreciable skin laxity abdomen ( include flank ) , face , neck , hip , thigh , upper arm & buttock determine study investigator , For female , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize , use medically accept form birth control least 3 month prior study , Apparently healthy , Informed consent sign subject . The exclusion criterion study : History skin hypersensitivity , Current skin disorder ( e.g . keloid scar ) infection ( e.g. , herpes simplex ) treatment area , Subjects pacemaker , internal defibrillator electronically , magnetically , mechanically activated implant , Subjects implant medical prosthesis ( clip , pin plate ) proximal treatment site , The current recent use ( within past 12 month ) isotretinoin , Pregnancy , Infectious diseases ( HIV ) present , Are tobacco smoker , Insulin dependent diabetic subject , Oxygen dependent subject , Subjects severe chronic illness , scleroderma , lupus , Subjects open sore scar treatment region , Subjects ischemia treatment region .
